item.title: Flight Crew Communication Equipment – TSO Headset Earphones/Headphones

remarks.para: Either the Captain’s or First Officer’s earphone/headphone may be inoperative or missing provided associated flight deck speaker is operative.

note.para: Only equipment approved under FAA Technical Standard Order (TSO), to include flightdeck microphones, headphones, and boom microphone headsets, may be used in UPS aircraft.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "Captain or First Officer earphone INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
